title: Gift Exchange
alt: In addition to having all their budgets in a spreadsheet with consistent formatting, they just love expressing preferences on a well-calibrated numerical scale.
transcript:
[Ponytail is talking to Cueball.]
Ponytail: Ugh, I have to organize a fair gift exchange for my survey-loving family.
Ponytail: Do you want to help?
Ponytail: They said it's "okay if it's complicated."[Caption below the panel:]
The perfect gift for a political scientist
